result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Scheduling Order. Signed by EFV on 10/27/22. arc

8:52 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Kevin Lee Brahs. Defendant Kevin Lee Brahs in court. Court reviews case. ADA Ballo has provided all discovery. Atty Dolfi does not have any potential motions and on track for resolution. Court sets STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 08:56 AM
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Filed by DDA Ellenwood. km

9:37 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy   Defendant Kevin Lee Brahs in court.  Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo w/ Intern Connor Smith in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Kevin Lee Brahs.  State calls New Richmond Detective Todd Schaffer.  Witness sworn.  Atty Smith direct. Court takes judicial notice of the bonds in Dunn County cases 19CF488, 20CF6 & 20CF320.  Witness identifies DF.  Atty Dolfi cross.  Atty Ballo redirect. Witness excused.  State argument.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Information will mirror criminal complaint.  DF wishes to proceed with arraignment today.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.   Court confirms address.  Bond continues.  Adjourned: 9:53
Settlement conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on October 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Settlement conference on September 21, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
DE appeared- Court quashed stated warrant. Warrant not signed or copied out.  gll

11:11 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin Lee Brahs in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Kevin Lee Brahs. Court questions non-appearance from earlier this morning. DE states his ride broke down on the way here. Court resets Preliminary Hearing before Court Commissioner. DE confirms address and phone number. Court quashes stayed warrant. Adjourned at 11:14 AM.  gll
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
DE called at 09:37 AM stating was supposed to be in court at 9 am this morning but his car broke down and cell phone died. Clerk advised DE a warrant was issued and to contact atty. arc

9:03 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin Lee Brahs not in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Kevin Lee Brahs. Officer appeared in person. Set for Preliminary Hearing. Court reviews file. Court will allow Atty Dolfi an opportunity to call Defendant. Off record at 9:17 AM. Recalled at 9:22 AM. Appearances as previously stated. Atty Dolfi left a voicemail for Defendant. ADA Becker requests body only warrant with adjoining states. Court issued warrant and STAYS until 7/7/22 at 11:30 AM. Adjourned at 9:23 AM.  gll

10: AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court, Defendant Kevin Lee Brahs in court. Court reviews case. Court notes case needs a PH. Court sets PH. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 10:19 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 7, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Filed by Atty Dolfi. km

By Robert S - 22R 008589. jaf
Per EFV. arc

ADDRESS INFO for Kevin Lee Brahs
Current: 218 Maple Street S. Apt 4, Turtle Lake, WI 54889 United States  (Effective: 06-22-2022)
Prior: 211 Maple Lane, Turtle Lake, WI 54889
Status conference on June 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Walmart in New Richmond, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:16 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Connor Smith with Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY: Stephanie Schmidt for today   DF:  Kevin Lee Brahs appeared from jail. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond argument; bond ordered. Court sets STC to check status of atty and for scheduling prelim. QUASH WARRANT. Adjourned at 1:21 PM.  gll  Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.
